item.title: BL-94 West/MT-59 North at MT-59 North Jct.
item.description: BL-94 West/MT-59 North (Main St.) at MT-59 North(7th St.) Jct. Use MT-59 north for Airport and Jordan.

item.title: BL-94 West at MT-59 - Miles City
item.description: BL-94 West (Valley Drive) at MT-59 (Main St.) in Miles City. Turn right on Main St. to continue west on BL-94.

item.title: BL-94 West - Miles City
item.description: Entering Miles City on BL-94 west. Miles City is the county seat of Custer County, and the largest city in eastern Montana.

item.title: BL-94 West - Miles City Business Loop
item.description: BL-94 West - Miles City Business Loop

item.title: US-12 West at I-94 West and BL-94
item.description: US-12 West at I-94 West to Billings. US-12 joins I-94 westbound. Continue straight for BL-94 west to Miles City.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 141 Offramp at US-12
item.description: I-94 East - Exit 141 Offramp at US-12. Turn right to continue east on US-12.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 141 Offramp
item.description: I-94 East on Exit 141 Offramp. Turn right for US-12 east to Baker. Turn left for BL-94 West to Miles City.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 141
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 141 - US-12 East/Miles City/Baker. US-12 leaves I-94 eastbound here. This is the eastern end of the Miles City business loop.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 135
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 135 - BL-94/Miles City/Jordan. This is the western end of the Miles City business loop. Miles City is the county seat of Custer County and the 10th largest city in Montana.
